Interaction with Part K and Part M
Where manual controls are provided, they should be within reasonable reach of the occupants, to comply with Approved Documents K and M. Interaction with Part K
This approved document, Approved Document O, gives guidance on increased levels of protection from falling from openings compared to Part K. Interaction with Part Q
